channel.title: CVE Feed for Fibar Group S.A -- Fibaro Home Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fibar Group S.A -- Fibaro Home Center

item.title: CVE-2021-20989|2024-09-17T00:42:24.901Z -- fibar%20group%20s.a -- fibaro%20home%20center
item.description: Fibaro Home Center 2 and Lite devices with firmware version 4.600 and older initiate SSH connections to the Fibaro cloud to provide remote access and remote support capabilities. This connection can be intercepted using DNS spoofing attack and a device initiated remote port-forward channel can be used to connect to the web management interface. Knowledge of authorization credentials to the management interface is required to perform any further actions.

item.title: CVE-2021-20992|2024-09-17T02:36:30.816Z -- fibar%20group%20s.a -- fibaro%20home%20center
item.description: In Fibaro Home Center 2 and Lite devices in all versions provide a web based management interface over unencrypted HTTP protocol. Communication between the user and the device can be eavesdropped to hijack sessions, tokens and passwords.
